name: Sub-Zero
description: The Arctic One has reappeared, centuries after its last ill-fated flight across the galaxy. The assimilated ship seems to be a herald of trouble ahead, as it gathers an army of other vessels loyal to the Borg. But where are these drones coming from?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Supply Missions in another Phase.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using La Sirena Borg Queen, any version of Crosis, Rooney, Tuvok, or Borg crew will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the Borg Cube, the Arctic One, or the Borg Sphere will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: La Sirena Borg Queen, Crosis, Rooney, Tuvok, or Borg
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Six of Ten
featured_crew.flavor: A Klingon flagship officer who, after becoming a Borg drone, collaborated with Voyager and became part of the movement against the Collective.

action.name: Their Sacrifice Will Not Be Forgotten

featured_crew.name: Rooney
featured_crew.flavor: Researcher of the Arctic Archaeological Group. Was assimilated by the Borg and became a Borg drone.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Hugh
rewards.flavor: Survivor of a Borg scout cube crash, Third of Five developed the spark of individuality and became Hugh.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

ship.name: Borg Sphere
ship.flavor: Borg spheres were primarily scout and long-range tactical vessels. Borg cubes sometimes housed Borg spheres as auxillary craft.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Six of Ten
rewards.flavor: A Klingon flagship officer who, after becoming a Borg drone, collaborated with Voyager and became part of the movement against the Collective.

action.name: Their Sacrifice Will Not Be Forgotten

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.

Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

adventures.name: Schematic
adventures.description: Gather intel on the modified drone vessels.

adventures.name: Inventory
adventures.description: Assess any supplies the drones might have taken.

adventures.name: Interference
adventures.description: Study any signals to or from the drone ships.

rewards.name: Sub-Zero
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Manifest
adventures.description: Compile a list of newly assimilated individuals.

adventures.name: Parallel
adventures.description: Seek commonalities between the new drones.

adventures.name: Interference
adventures.description: Study any signals to or from the drone ships.

rewards.name: Sub-Zero
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Rooney
rewards.flavor: Researcher of the Arctic Archaeological Group. Was assimilated by the Borg and became a Borg drone.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "Captain, thank you for answering my hails in an expeditious manner. Time is of the essence. The Arctic One, a 22nd century Earth vessel, has reappeared in its assimilated form."

"Her crew will not respond to any hails. Were that all, it would not be such a cause for alarm. However, other ships have begun following the Arctic One, attacking anyone who attempts to confront the vessel."

"The moment you underestimate them, your fate is sealed. These new drones may be freshly assimilated, but their power still far outmatches that of any human. But proceed, attempt to face them, if you're foolish enough."
"Captain, thank you for answering my hails in an expeditious manner. Time is of the essence. The Arctic One, a 22nd century Earth vessel, has reappeared in its assimilated form."

"Her crew will not respond to any hails. Were that all, it would not be such a cause for alarm. However, other ships have begun following the Arctic One, attacking anyone who attempts to confront the vessel."

"The moment you underestimate them, your fate is sealed. These new drones may be freshly assimilated, but their power still far outmatches that of any human. But proceed, attempt to face them, if you're foolish enough."
"Rise, awakened drones, and join the Collective. You have been chosen to join in the search for perfection. When you are with us, you will never know loneliness again."

responses.text: "We won't allow you to lay waste to the Alpha Quadrant."

screens.text: "What is it you mean by 'awakened'? Who are these new drones? There has been no recent Borg activity within the Alpha Quadrant, so how is it they were assimilated?"
"If you are so keen to join the Collective, that can certainly be arranged."
"Perfection. The only goal worth pursuing. Won't you join us?"
"Why do you assume violence? We only seek to expand the Collective in the pursuit of perfection."

"We cannot let these new drones continue on like this. Being further from the Collective, they are at higher risk for acting more erratically. We must investigate and determine what it is they are after."
"Rise, awakened drones, and join the Collective. You have been chosen to join in the search for perfection. When you are with us, you will never know loneliness again."

responses.text: "We won't allow you to lay waste to the Alpha Quadrant."

screens.text: "What is it you mean by 'awakened'? Who are these new drones? There has been no recent Borg activity within the Alpha Quadrant, so how is it they were assimilated?"
"If you are so keen to join the Collective, that can certainly be arranged."
"Perfection. The only goal worth pursuing. Won't you join us?"
"Why do you assume violence? We only seek to expand the Collective in the pursuit of perfection."

"We cannot let these new drones continue on like this. Being further from the Collective, they are at higher risk for acting more erratically. We must investigate and determine what it is they are after."
